analysis.description:
x32323 (/unique_chucks/19/0xffb74c57def8667afadb4e05b64a928047e1c55c.sol#19-187) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/19/0xffb74c57def8667afadb4e05b64a928047e1c55c.sol#93-102)

x32323._transfer (/unique_chucks/19/0xffb74c57def8667afadb4e05b64a928047e1c55c.sol#67-87) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances)
x32323.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0xffb74c57def8667afadb4e05b64a928047e1c55c.sol#34)
